resources.name: Avenger Stalker
resources.title: Avenger Stalker
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: An ex-police cruiser spacecraft, the Avenger is a powerful platform for Bounty Hunters to build their fortunes with. Featuring a rugged spaceframe and plenty of customization options, the Avenger is a great choice for someone who doesn't want the flash of the 300 Series.
resources.label: Avenger Stalker

resources.name: Avenger Titan
resources.title: Avenger Titan
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: Lacking the Prisoner Cells of the Stalker or the EMP Generator of the Warlock, the Titan’s hold is free to carry cargo. Couple that available space with the Avenger’s tried and true combat abilities and you’ve got a light cargo hauler that’s more than capable of handling itself in a fight.
resources.label: Avenger Titan

resources.name: Gladius
resources.title: Gladius
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: The Gladius is an older design which has been updated over the years to keep up with modern technology. In military circles, the Gladius is beloved for its performance and its simplicity. A fast, light fighter with a laser-focus on dogfighting, the Gladius is an ideal interceptor or escort ship.
resources.label: Gladius

resources.name: Redeemer
resources.title: Redeemer
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: Now you can own the Next Great Starship. The Aegis Redeemer is a powerful fighting ship capable of dominating combat with an immensely powerful weapons payload. Bristling with turrets and missiles, the Redeemer is effective in almost any conceivable combat scenario.
resources.label: Redeemer

resources.name: Arrow
resources.title: Arrow
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: Unmatched design, blazing top speed, and ultra-responsive maneuverability make the Arrow the most agile scrapper in its class. And, a robust weapons package provides firepower to spare. This is truly the classic light fighter updated for the next generation of combat.
resources.label: Arrow

resources.name: Ballista
resources.title: Ballista
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: Accommodating ten guided missiles, the Ballista self-propelled air defense system is capable of destruction on a massive scale. Chew through shields, incapacitate or obliterate airborne threats of almost any class foolhardy enough to come within 2000 meters. Whether its pummeling enemies on the frontlines or watching over a strategic post, the Ballista won't just level the playing field, it'll level the competition.
resources.label: Ballista

resources.name: C8R Pisces
resources.title: C8R Pisces
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt:
With the addition of an onboard Tier 3 Medical Bed, the C8R Pisces can treat minor injuries and keep a patient stable while transporting them to the safety of a larger ship, station, or nearby medical facility, making it an invaluable asset for short-range search and rescue.

*This special event edition comes with an exclusive lifetime insurance contract*

*Warbond version pledges CANNOT be purchased with store credit*
resources.label: C8R Pisces

resources.name: C8R Pisces
resources.title: C8R Pisces
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: With the addition of an onboard Tier 3 Medical Bed, the C8R Pisces can treat minor injuries and keep a patient stable while transporting them to the safety of a larger ship, station, or nearby medical facility, making it an invaluable asset for short-range search and rescue.
resources.label: C8R Pisces

resources.name: C8X Pisces Expedition
resources.title: C8X Pisces Expedition
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: Enhancing the standard C8 explorer with added firepower and a limited-edition livery, the C8X Expedition turns a stout snub into a capable stand-alone vessel, ideal for exploring tight spots and unique environments inaccessible to larger ships.
resources.label: C8X Pisces Expedition

resources.name: Centurion
resources.title: Centurion
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: Built on Anvil’s popular Atlas Platform, the Centurion presents a tactical solution for short-range anti-aircraft operations. Dominate any combat zone by assuring immediate threats from above are dealt with quickly and efficiently, thanks to the Centurion’s custom energy-based AA turret.
resources.label: Centurion

resources.name: Hornet
resources.title: Hornet
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: The Hornet is the civilian version of the F7A Hornet flown off of the elite Bengal carrier vanguard of the UEE Navy. While not outfitted for long range runs, the Hornet can take her share of hits… and dish out a consistent, powerful response. The Hornet may be uglier than anything from Origin’s lineup, but pilots love them for their rugged reliability.
resources.label: Hornet

resources.name: F7C-R Hornet Tracker
resources.title: F7C-R Hornet Tracker
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: If the Ghost is made to hide, the Tracker is made to seek. The F7C-R Tracker boasts an advanced radar suite making it ideal for deep-space explorers who require depth and accuracy in their scan packages. Local militia and larger merc units will also repurpose Trackers to act as mobile C&C ships for their squadrons.
resources.label: F7C-R Hornet Tracker

resources.name: F7C-S Hornet Ghost
resources.title: F7C-S Hornet Ghost
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: Through a combination of low-emission drives, low-draw weapons, and Void Armor technology capable of diffusing scans, the F7C-S Ghost is built for the pilot who wants to keep a low profile. The Ghost is capable of slipping past the most ardent of observers to accomplish whatever goal you need to accomplish. Don’t worry, we won’t ask.
resources.label: F7C-S Hornet Ghost

resources.name: Aopoa Nox
resources.title: Aopoa Nox
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: Hit the skids with the 2947 Nox. This speedy and maneuverable open-canopy racer from Aopoa is capable of zipping along planet surfaces or deep space. Available for the first time in Human space, the Nox has been specifically redesigned for Human pilots, so grab your ship and head to the racetrack today.
resources.label: Aopoa Nox

resources.name: Argo Mole
resources.title: Argo Mole
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: Work faster and more effectively than ever before with ARGO’s iconic multi-crew miner. Comes with the classic ARGO skin.
resources.label: Argo Mole

resources.name: Mustang Alpha
resources.title: Mustang Alpha
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: Inspired by Consolidated Outland CEO Silas Koerner’s cutting edge vision, the Mustang Alpha is a sleek, stylish spacecraft that uses ultralight alloys to push power ratios to the limits, albeit sometimes unsafely. And now, with the optional Cargo Carrier, you can have the Alpha’s advantages without sacrificing carrying capacity.
resources.label: Mustang Alpha

resources.name: Mustang Beta
resources.title: Mustang Beta
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: The Mustang Beta, with its unprecedented range, is made for long duration flights. The factory standard Tarsus Leaper Jump Engine enables the Beta to travel to the galaxy’s farthest systems with ease, while the ship’s unique Com4T living quarters will make the journey feel like you never left home.
resources.label: Mustang Beta

resources.name: Mustang Gamma
resources.title: Mustang Gamma
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: Consolidated Outland’s design and engineering teams have managed to tweak and refine the Mustang into an admirable racer. The end result, the Mustang Gamma, has smooth acceleration, and power on demand thanks to an innovative package featuring three powerful Magma Jet engines for maximum thrust.
resources.label: Mustang Gamma

resources.name: Nomad
resources.title: Nomad
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: With the versatility of a medium-sized multi-purpose freighter packed into a stylish, compact frame, the Consolidated Outland Nomad is the model of self-sufficiency, the spirit of the open sky, and the perfect solution for anyone yearning to start a brand-new adventure.
resources.label: Nomad

resources.name: C2 Hercules
resources.title: C2 Hercules
resources.subtitle: Standalone Ship
resources.body: * This is not a GAME PACKAGE. Please note a GAME PACKAGE is required to play the game and fly or access your ships.
resources.excerpt: Utilizing the patented Hercules military-grade spaceframe and expanding cargo capacity, while sacrificing barely any firepower, the C2 has taken the private sector by storm. It has become the industry standard for racing teams, ship dealers and manufacturers, construction orgs, mining corporations, and even large-scale touring entertainment outfits.
resources.label: C2 Hercules
